And in secrets,

cuộc chiến chống người khổng lồ.

and the Giants got away with the smallest fine in the world.

-the monster grew bigger and stronger.

because the computer has run out of battery.

- Laptop em hết pin. - Cô thấy rồi.

 Đây.

-The power is out of my house, so. -Yeah, I see that.

where they could use their special gifts.
